mapper.select: select b.batch_name,ps.papers_id,cs.courses_name from user u left join user uu on u.departments_id=uu.departments_id left join teach t on t.user_id=u.user_id left join courses cs on cs.courses_id=t.courses_id left join userrole ur on ur.user_id=u.user_id left join papers ps on ur.role_id=ps.role_id left join batch b on b.batch_id=ps.batch_id where u.user_id=#{user_id} and u.user_id!=uu.user_id group by courses_name

select b.batch_name,ps.papers_id,cs.courses_name from user u left join user uu on u.departments_id=uu.departments_id left join teach t on t.user_id=u.user_id left join courses cs on cs.courses_id=t.courses_id left join userrole ur on ur.user_id=u.user_id left join papers ps on ur.role_id=ps.role_id left join batch b on b.batch_id=ps.batch_id where b.batch_id=#{batch_id} and u.user_id!=uu.user_id group by courses_name
